page.title: 04DAIRSIE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The old school was built in 1868 and the new school was built in 1970. At the same time the old school was knocked down. The new school is very modern. The school has three classrooms and a library with a wide range of books. The school has a dining hall and Hall. We watch T.V. in the dining hall and have drama, P.E. and music in the Hall. We have huge windows, which are not double glazed. The walls are brick and each classroom has a fire exit. The view from our classroom includes nature, farm technology, wildlife, busy traffic and one of the treasures of Dairsie - the Hall. It was built in memory of the dead of the First World War. Jonathan Miller.
